short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ekstep time log in Jira should auto update to Kronos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EkStep - Time sync is an official product from Kronos, that helps you streamline and track your time at work.

By adding the EkStep-Time sync extension to your Chrome browser:
1. You agree to provide access to your Atlassian Jira account
2. The extension automatically syncs the time you log on Jira to your Kronos account

To add the extension:
1. Click on the Add extension button
2. Click Allow 

Note: By adding Ekstep-Time sync as an extension you agree to its Conditions of Use.
